statements: SELECT * FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, side_effects FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_id = 2;
SELECT interaction_description, side_effects FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, drug_name, side_effects FROM drug_interactions WHERE side_effects IS NOT NULL ORDER BY drug_name ASC, interaction_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT drug_name FROM drug_interactions WHERE side_effects LIKE '%Headache%' AND interaction_description LIKE '%drowsiness%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT * FROM Drug_Interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_with FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT side_effect_name FROM Side_Effects WHERE drug_id = 2 ORDER BY side_effect_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE interaction_with LIKE 'Acetaminophen%';
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM Drug_Interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_with FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE interaction_with LIKE '%interacts%';
SELECT drug_name, side_effect_name FROM Drug_Interactions JOIN Side_Effects ON Drug_Interactions.drug_id = Side_Effects.drug_id;
SELECT drug_name, side_effect_name FROM Drug_Interactions JOIN Side_Effects ON Drug_Interactions.drug_id = Side_Effects.drug_id WHERE side_effect_name = 'nausea';

SELECT drug_name, COUNT(side_effect_id) AS num_side_effects FROM Drug_Interactions LEFT JOIN Side_Effects ON Drug_Interactions.drug_id = Side_Effects.drug_id GROUP BY drug_name ORDER BY num_side_effects DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_name, severity FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_type='major';
SELECT id, drug_name, frequency FROM side_effects ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, interaction_type FROM medication_safety WHERE interaction_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT drug_name, side_effect FROM medication_safety JOIN side_effects ON medication_safety.side_effect_id = side_effects.id;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type, severity FROM drug_interactions WHERE severity = 'High'
SELECT side_effect, frequency, drug_name FROM side_effects WHERE frequency = 'Rare' ORDER BY side_effect ASC
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type, severity FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Major' AND severity = 'High'
SELECT drug_name, side_effect, frequency FROM medication_safety JOIN side_effects ON medication_safety.side_effect_id = side_effects.id WHERE frequency = 'Common'

SELECT drug_name, interaction_type, severity, side_effect, frequency FROM drug_interactions JOIN medication_safety ON drug_interactions.id = medication_safety.interaction_id JOIN side_effects ON medication_safety.side_effect_id = side_effects.id ORDER BY interaction_type DESC, frequency DESC
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug1_id, drug2_id, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Severe';
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, dosage FROM drugs ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT side_effect, effect_description FROM drug_side_effects WHERE drug_id = 3 ORDER BY side_effect DESC;
SELECT drug_name, dosage, manufacturer FROM drugs WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Severe';
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM drugs ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, dosage FROM patient_medication WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, dosage FROM drugs JOIN patient_medication ON drugs.id = patient_medication.drug_id WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY dosage ASC;
SELECT drug1_id, drug2_id, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Moderate' ORDER BY drug1_id, drug2_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage='50mg';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, drug1, drug2 FROM interactions WHERE drug1='Aspirin';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, usage_instructions FROM medications WHERE medication_name LIKE '%pain%';
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT drug, side_effect FROM side_effects ORDER BY side_effect DESC;
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM patients WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
